sys_ui_page.html:
var store = gs.getUser().getFullName(); var store_sys_id = gs.getUserID();
Welcome:{{user}}

Cartons with Five Day Warning

Selecting this option will display cartons that will be closed and received into Micros within the next 5 business days.

Select

Cartons In-Transit Over 14 days

Selecting this option will display cartons that have been on your in-transit report for more than 14 days and require further research.

Select

Cartons with Assigned Shipment Ticket

Selecting this option will display cartons that have an assigned shipment ticket and our inventory/logistics teams will further investigate.

Select
Aged In-Transit cartons will be displayed to show the following:
  • Cartons with a Five Day Warning: displays open in-transit cartons that will be closed and received into micros within the next 5 business days.
  • Cartons In-Transit Over 14 days: displays open in-transit cartons that have not been received into micros.
  • Cartons with Assigned Shipment Ticket: displays cartons that have been assigned to a department for research.

Cartons In-Transit Over 14 days

These cartons have been on your in-transit report for more than 14 days. Please select a carton below. Review each question thoroughly to determine if the carton has been delivered or if a shipment ticket needs to be created.

Carton Numbers: Ship Date: Expected In-Store Date:
{{cart.carton_id}} {{cart.in_trn_date}} {{cart.expected_in_store_date}}

*As a reminder, if a carton has been delivered you must select the "Confirm" option displayed within the questionnaire. This will receive the carton into micros and close the ticket.If you have any questions please contact our Support Center at 201-295-7878 for further assistance.

Cartons with 5-Day Warning

These cartons have been on your in-transit report for more than 14 days AND will be closed and received into Micros if no action is taken. Please select a carton below. Review each question thoroughly to determine if the carton has been delivered or if a shipment ticket needs to be created.

Carton Numbers: Ship Date: Expected In-Store Date:
{{cart.carton_num}} {{cart.in_trn_date}} {{cart.expected_in_store_date}}

*As a reminder, if a carton has been delivered you must select the "Confirm" option displayed within the questionnaire. This will receive the carton into micros and close the ticket.If you have any questions please contact our Support Center at 201-295-7878 for further assistance.

Cartons with Assigned Shipment Ticket

These cartons have been auto-closed and a Service-Now ticket has been created. Please select the "Shipment Ticket" below for further information and updates.

Carton Numbers: Shipment Tickets: Ship Date: Expected In-Store Date:
{{cart.carton_num}} {{cart.shp_inc_num}} {{cart.in_trn_date}} {{cart.expected_in_store_date}}

*As a reminder, if a carton has been delivered you must select the "Confirm" option displayed within the questionnaire. This will receive the carton into micros and close the ticket.If you have any questions, please contact our Support Center at 201-295-7878 for further assistance.
sys_ui_page.name: OpenInTransitCartons
